{{Envisaged Echo Intro}}

==Phase I==
===Challenge Objectives===
* Light up all the Cryo Monuments within a short time

==Phase II==
===Challenge Objectives===
* Defeat all opponents within the time limit

===Special Rules===
* In "Icy Resurrection Phase II," all party members will {{Color|bp|periodically lose HP}}. Characters can be {{Color|bp|defeated}} by this HP loss.
* Opponents' Physical and Cryo RES are increased in "Icy Resurrection Phase II."
